Name: Five-Finger Gunslinger
About the game: Five-Finger Gunslinger is a third-person online arena-battle game where players compete against their friends to become the most popular kid in the west. Battle evil cactus-bandits and pelt your opponents with water balloons as you struggle for suburban supremacy! Features A handcrafted western neighborhood created by kids to live out their wild west fantasies! Three unique characters: Five-Finger Gunslinger, Rancher Enchanter, and Astronaut Aquashot each with unique gameplay and mechanics! Persuade kids to join your posse by spending coolness points collected from defeating imaginary cactus-bandits! Grow your posse to raise your popularity! Increase your popularity to grow your popularity-sphere and assert your dominance over the neighborhood! Three types of imaginary cactus-bandits to battle: Disaster Cactus, Shadow Cactus, and Crystal Cactus! Move inside other player's popularity-spheres to see what enemies they are imagining! Destroy your opponent's enemies and steal coolness away from them! Play with friends in private servers, online against strangers, or even battle vs AI opponents! Development Team Producer: Amy Zebrowski Lead Designer: Griffin Carlson Level Designer: Tyler Lamon Lead Programmer: Jacob Rose AI Programmer: Kyle Murray Lead Artist: Lee Siassi Environment Artist: Jodi M.
